basics.name: Luca Di Marco
basics.label: Full-Stack Developer
basics.summary:
Detail-oriented web developer with a passion for crafting sleek, user-friendly interfaces.
Eager to explore opportunities and contribute creativity, innovation, and technical expertise to collaborative software development projects.

work.name: Askbot
work.summary: Sole developer responsible for all frontend aspects of the Askbot project.
highlights: Optimized website performance, achieving a 20% reduction in page load times
Integrated frontend with backend APIs, delivering real-time updates and dynamic features
Implemented SEO best practices, resulting in a 15% increase in organic search traffic.
Integrated web analytics tools (e.g., Google Tag Manager) to track user behavior and marketing campaigns.

work.name: ADN Soluciones Web
work.summary: Collaborative project with colleagues from a bootcamp, focusing on web development.
highlights: Contributed to the success of 3 group projects, delivering impactful frontend solutions and meeting project goals.
Mastered version control with Git, ensuring efficient collaboration and code management.
Took ownership of designing and developing the company's landing page from concept to completion.

work.name: SaTech / Country Club: El Tipal
work.summary: Contributed to the development and optimization of a reliable security system
highlights: Programmed custom features for the security system, reducing false alarms by 15%.
Optimized codebase to reduce memory usage by 35%.
Received positive feedback from clients and users for delivering a reliable and user-friendly security solution.

work.name: 7CAVAS
work.summary: Managed and optimized web content for 7CAVAS, achieving significant improvements in user engagement and site performance.
highlights: Optimized website performance, reducing page load times by 2 seconds.
Implemented SEO best practices, leading to a 20% improvement in search engine rankings.
Optimized meta tags and descriptions to improve click-through rates.
Managed social media presence and campaigns, driving a 60% increase in referral traffic.

awards.title: Best Final Project
awards.summary: Recognized by MindHub LA for outstanding final project (MyTinerary).

projects.name: Laggy or not
